Articles.Content: Take off from KSC 1, circumnavigate Kerbin, and land back at KSC 1. Only autopilot allowed is avionics package or ASAS. Attached is my plane \'Albatross\', which made it from KSC 1 to KSC 2 the long way. MET of my best attempt (KSC 1->KSC 2) was about 2.5 hours.

I did this a few days ago 

[http://imgur.com/a/QNkT6](http://imgur.com/a/QNkT6)

3 hours. Thank goodness I was watching a movie on the other monitor
